items.summary: Ensure camera actions behave safely when the user is not authenticated: allow viewing the camera preview, but when the user attempts actions that require identity-backed persistence (e.g., saving captured media), show an English message explaining they must sign in to save to Gallery (or offer to continue as guest where applicable).

Change the app launch flow so that the Camera is the default starting view for all users (authenticated, guest, and logged-out), and it renders as a full-screen “big camera” experience (no header/sidebar/container padding) immediately after the intro splash completes.

Remove the current automatic redirect that forces logged-out users to the Login screen on startup; instead, keep the user on the full-screen Camera and provide a clear, non-blocking authentication prompt on the camera experience (e.g., an overlay or button group) to either sign in with Internet Identity or continue as guest.
